ValidationRule.description: Deprecated by Abhinav and Snehal, not supported.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(loan__Loan_Cycle_Setup__c, 'Same for all Loans') ,OR( ISBLANK( loan__Max_Interest_Rate__c ) , ISBLANK( loan__Min_Interest_Rate__c ),ISBLANK( loan__Default_Interest_Rate__c ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please fill out the Interest section.
